security: Revealing the use of official cover can compromise ongoing operations and endanger individuals associated with the program. Directly quoting the instructions to 'Keep on top of file while cover in effect' and 'Submit Form 1322 for any change affecting this cover' highlights the sensitive nature of managing cover identities.
summary: Notification of the establishment of official cover for David S. Morales within the US Army Staff Group under the MAZE unit, effective July 1971, with instructions to maintain cover documentation and report any changes.
summary_one_paragraph: This document, dated September 3, 1971, is a notification of the establishment of official cover for David S. Morales (employee number 063385) within the US Army Staff Group, assigned to the MAZE unit; official cover status is noted as continuing, effective July 1971, and the notification provides instructions to maintain official documentation, submit Form 1322 for changes, and ensure that the Army W-2 is issued; previous cover assignments are mentioned including locations and entities such as Florida NOO, Peru AID INT, and Vietnam DAC; James A. Franklin, Chief of the Official Cover, Central Cover Staff is identified as the responsible party for managing this cover.
title: Notification of Establishment or Cancellation of Official Cover Backstop
recipient: Chief, Control Division; Chief, Contract Personnel Division; Chief, Operating Component (FE)
sender: Chief, Official Cover, Central Cover Staff (James A. Franklin)
